synopsis:
As Tamahi and a few of her classmates make their way home after school, they are jolted by the sight of a person plummeting from the top of a neighboring apartment. Frenzied and bewildered, they hurry to the building, only to discover that it is completely empty. As Tamahi contemplates this enigma, a sense of apprehension settles over her, leaving her to ponder the source of the eerie aura that surrounds them.
(Source: HIDIVE)
